catalog_info.title: Advanced Fiction Writing: Workshop
catalog_info.notes: Admission based on submitted samples of writing. For information on specific application requirements, please see the English Department's Creative Writing web page.
catalog_info.description: Intended for students with prior fiction-writing and workshop experience, this course will concentrate on the structure, execution and revision of short fiction. Throughout the term, we will read and discuss literary fiction from a craft perspective. The course is primarily focused on the discussion of student work, with the aim of improving both writerly skills and critical analysis. Revision is an important component of this class.
